replies.body: Arcade kayn with be cool if one form was a battle boss and another was a normal arcade skin. It could be called Arcayn
My loyalties lie with Final Boss Veigar. Bow miserable arcade champions, to his tiny majesty!

Hey Oceania! Feel free to join OCE's largest discord server for LoL. We have RP giveaways and much more:
